etymologies: early 21st century: from abbreviations of devolution and maximum

definitions: a proposed constitutional arrangement by which Scotland would be granted full economic independence from the rest of the United Kingdom but would still be subject to governance by the British Parliament in particular areas, such as defense or foreign policy

examples.text: opinion polls placed public support for devo max at 60 percent
the First Minister was accused of ‘flying in the face of economic reality’ by pushing for devo max

shortDefinitions: proposed arrangement by which Scotland would be granted full economic independence from rest of UK
